label: City Tours
description: Private city tours covering Rio icons, culture, and neighborhoods with skip-the-line access.

faqs.question: Are city tours private?
faqs.answer: Yes. All tours are private and tailored to your group.

faqs.question: Do you include skip-the-line access?
faqs.answer: Yes for key attractions like Sugarloaf and strategic timing for Christ.

tours.id: The Essential Rio: Icons, Culture & Hidden Gems
tours.name: The Essential Rio: Icons, Culture & Hidden Gems
tours.description: Experience Rio's most iconic landmarks in one comprehensive private tour, including Christ the Redeemer and Sugarloaf Mountain. Skip-the-line tickets for Sugarloaf included.
highlights: Christ the Redeemer with priority access
Royal Portuguese Reading Room (Monday to Friday)

tours.id: Rio Express: Christ & Sugarloaf in 5 Hours
tours.name: Rio Express: Christ & Sugarloaf in 5 Hours
tours.description: Perfect for travelers with limited time - visit Rio's two most iconic landmarks in just 5 hours.

tours.id: Rio at First Light: Sunrise Sugarloaf & Christ
tours.name: Rio at First Light: Sunrise Sugarloaf & Christ
tours.description: Experience Rio's most breathtaking sunrise from Sugarloaf Mountain, followed by early access to Christ the Redeemer.
highlights: Early morning Christ the Redeemer visit

tours.id: Golden Hour Rio: Christ & Sugarloaf at Sunset
tours.name: Golden Hour Rio: Christ & Sugarloaf at Sunset
tours.description: Experience Rio's golden hour beauty with afternoon visits to Christ the Redeemer and a perfectly timed sunset from Sugarloaf Mountain.
highlights: Christ the Redeemer in golden light

tours.id: Sunset & Culture: Rio Icons + Roxy Brazilian Dance Show
tours.name: Sunset & Culture: Rio Icons + Roxy Brazilian Dance Show
tours.description: Combine Rio's sunset from Sugarloaf with an unforgettable evening at Brazil's premier cultural dinner show.

tours.id: Tijuca Rainforest & Museums: Where Nature Meets Culture
tours.name: Tijuca Rainforest & Museums: Where Nature Meets Culture
tours.description: Combine Sugarloaf Mountain's stunning vistas with the lush beauty of Tijuca Forest and Botanical Garden.
highlights: Tijuca Forest - world's largest urban forest

tours.id: Niterói: Niemeyer's MAC Museum & Colonial Forts
tours.name: Niterói: Niemeyer's MAC Museum & Colonial Forts
tours.description: Cross Guanabara Bay to discover Niterói's architectural masterpiece MAC Museum and historic military forts.

tours.id: Modern Rio: Museum of Tomorrow & Sambadrome Behind the Scenes
tours.name: Modern Rio: Museum of Tomorrow & Sambadrome Behind the Scenes
tours.description: Explore Rio's innovative Museum of Tomorrow, South America's largest aquarium, and go behind the scenes of Carnival.

tours.id: Your Rio, Your Way: Custom Private Tour
tours.name: Your Rio, Your Way: Custom Private Tour
tours.description: Can't find exactly what you're looking for? Design your own Rio experience. Tell us your interests, and we'll craft a personalized itinerary just for you.
highlights: 100% customizable itinerary based on your interests
Expert local guide who adapts to your pace and style
Combine any attractions, neighborhoods, or experiences
Flexible duration from half-day to multi-day adventures
Perfect for special occasions, unique interests, or accessibility needs
We handle all logistics, tickets, and reservations
